review: I LOVE THIS DEVICE! ! ! !Great streaming device and I can't believe that they are only $30. I've recommended that all my family and friends get one of these.
author: Dhindtjr23

review: Its a great device for what it does, pretty much turn tv to an all in one media consumer for streaming content. We mainly use it for Netflix and Plex even though we already had an xbox360 and ps3 already plugged into our tv. There's simply nothing better for Plex.Mine only gripe is that for some apps, like Netflix and Plex, (and it's probably their fault rather than Chromecast's) is that it doesn't play the next episode automatically which is a hassle when you're trying to catch up with the last season of your favorite series.

review: The device is pretty slick.  It definitely has the limitations and we can't get things like amazon instant video to work with it, but that's a different issue

review: Even if this is due to slow internet speeds (which it should not be as I have very fast internet), the chromecast should buffer for longer. I wish there were more apps like xfinityTV, but I guess this is not up to google.

author: S. Ponder

review: I was a little skeptical that such a small device would work so well but it really does.  We use it in the bedroom and we don't get great wifi reception in there and it works perfectly.  We use it mainly to watch Netflix and listen to Pandora radio.  I'm going to get rid of the cable box in my kids playroom and replace it with this.  My 6 and 3 year old know how to use Netflix on the Ipad so they will have no trouble working this device.  They will be able to pick whatever they want on Netflix to watch on the big screen.
author: Veronica's Mommy

review: This little dongle has a whole of potential and is very affordable.  Works great with netflix, HBO go from my phone.Unfortunately, it hasn't been greatly adopted by 3rd party apps yet, but that may change in the future.The cons of this dongle is that it is a little slow when mirroring video from the chrome browser.  This may be due to the fact that you have two separate streams running at the same time: one on the chromecast and one on the laptop.  It would be nice if you had the option to just send the video to the chromecast like you do from your phone rather than just mirroring.Cool little toy with a lot of potential
